description: Krissie Dee has had a long standing fantasy of being snatched out of her dorm room at night and used as a fuck hole for frat boys. Today we bring her fantasy to life! It's pledge week for all the sororities at Krissie's college, and she is dying to get in. Every pledge is given an envelope that they must keep with them at all times to get in. When Krissie falls asleep clutching the envelope in her hand she is grabbed by 5 men, but in a sack, and dragged to the frat house where they bind her elbows behind her back and fuck the living shit out of her. She has no idea what is happening or why until she gets 5 loads of cum on her face and the frat brother's take a picture of her to send to the Sorority House. Good thing for Krissie, she gets fucked, and she gets in! This is Krissie's FIRST GANGBANG EVER! Don't miss it!
title: The Pledge: Sorority Initiation Featuring Krissie Dee's First Gangbang
